about_the_game:
Bruno is looking for those who left him.
He wants know the reason.
Will he bring the Light to them or no?

The Keep Light is a simple indie game and new masterpiece for connoisseurs of minimalism.
You have to solve puzzles and find a way.
Classic platformer controls make you ready to play from start.
Juicy and atmospheric 3D world put you in a deep mood from beginning to the end of story.
Discover two endings depending on your choice.

And don't forget to keep light inside :)
detailed_description:
Bruno is looking for those who left him.
He wants know the reason.
Will he bring the Light to them or no?

The Keep Light is a simple indie game and new masterpiece for connoisseurs of minimalism.
You have to solve puzzles and find a way.
Classic platformer controls make you ready to play from start.
Juicy and atmospheric 3D world put you in a deep mood from beginning to the end of story.
Discover two endings depending on your choice.

And don't forget to keep light inside :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 2018 LTS
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan Support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 2020 LTS
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan Support
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Sierra
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics 2.2GHz - 256GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX Big Sur
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 4.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 2.8GHz
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Keep Light

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 / DirectX 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Bruno is looking for those who left him. He wants know the reason. Will he bring the Light to them or no?
